Text:
hi trfkad, can you upload the other cd of this please. as i have noticed that this is a 2cd and i can only see one cd..  thanks

http://hmv.com/hmvweb/displayProductDetails.do?ctx=-1;1;-1;-1;-1&sku=913729
no, it's 1 cd. That one is a limited edition with a second cd with instrumental versions of the same tracks...
ok no problem. thanks for the upload
Thanks, trfkad - didn't even know this existed and they're one of my all-time favorite groups... much appreciated!
